title: Build alert filtering and sorting service
description: Implement alert filtering by type (watch/warning/advisory) and severity. Include sorting by urgency, geographic relevance, and expiration time. Support user filter preferences.

title: Implement Air Quality endpoint
description: Build GET /airquality/current endpoint with AQI value, category, color, primary pollutant, and detailed pollutant breakdown (PM2.5, PM10, O3, NO2, CO)

title: Set up database migrations system
description: Configure database migration tool for PostgreSQL schema versioning, rollback support, and CI/CD integration

title: Build pollen and allergy index display
description: Implement allergy forecast with tree, grass, ragweed levels. Include severity indicators, daily/weekly trends, and personalized recommendations based on pollen types.

title: Implement Hourly Forecast screen with list and chart views
description: Build the hourly forecast screen (/(tabs)/hourly) with HourlyList showing full 48-hour forecast, TemperatureChart line chart, PrecipitationBars for precipitation probability. Implement toggle between list and chart view, pull-to-refresh, sticky header with current hour highlighted, and HourDetailSheet bottom sheet on tap.

title: Build weather alert display system
description: Implement alert banner display at top of dashboard with severity coloring (red for warnings, orange for watches, yellow for advisories). Handle single and multiple alert display, implement alert detail modal/page.

title: Implement bottom sheet components for detail views
description: Build reusable bottom sheet component using react-native-gesture-handler for smooth gestures. Implement HourDetailSheet showing full hour details, DayDetailSheet for detailed day forecast, LayerSelector for map layer controls. Support snap points and drag-to-dismiss.

title: Build Android home screen widgets and notification channels
description: Implement Android home screen widgets showing current conditions and forecast. Configure notification channels for different alert types (critical alerts, weather warnings, daily forecast). Support adaptive icons and Android 12+ Material You theming integration.

title: Implement JWT authentication
description: Build JWT token authentication with 1-hour expiry, refresh tokens with 30-day expiry, and Bearer token header support

title: Set up Redis caching layer
description: Configure Redis 7.x connection with cache patterns: current conditions (5min TTL), hourly forecast (1hr), daily forecast (6hr), alerts (1min), location search (24hr), geocode (30 days)

title: Implement unit preferences settings
description: Build unit preferences UI: temperature (F/C), wind speed (mph/km-h/m-s/knots), pressure (inHg/mb/hPa), precipitation (inches/mm). Optimistically update UI, sync to server if logged in, store in localStorage for guests.

title: Implement Dynamic Type and reduce motion preferences
description: Add support for iOS Dynamic Type for scalable text. Implement reduce motion preference detection to disable complex animations when enabled. Ensure all text scales appropriately without breaking layouts. Test with various text size settings.

title: Build offline support with cached data and UI states
description: Implement offline caching: current conditions (30min), hourly forecast (1hr), daily forecast (6hr), radar tiles (15min) in AsyncStorage/filesystem. Show 'Offline - showing cached data' banner, gray out refresh, display last updated time. Handle no-cache offline state with retry button.

title: Build animation system with Reanimated for transitions and interactions
description: Implement animation system using React Native Reanimated: card expand/collapse with spring animation, screen transitions (slide from right), modal transitions (slide from bottom), refresh spinner rotation, radar loop frame animation. Use standard durations: fast (150ms), normal (250ms), slow (350ms).

title: Implement UV protection time calculator
description: Build UV exposure calculator showing safe sun exposure times based on UV index and skin type. Include sunburn risk warnings and protection recommendations (SPF, shade seeking).

title: Build hourly forecast graph visualization
description: Implement interactive temperature/precipitation charts for hourly view. Support temperature line graph, precipitation bar overlay, touch/hover data points, and responsive scaling.

title: Build notification settings page
description: Implement notification settings: push notification toggle, alert type checkboxes, minimum severity selector, location monitoring selection. Handle browser permission states and provide instructions for denied permissions.

title: Implement push notifications for weather alerts
description: Set up Expo Notifications for weather alerts. Configure notification types: Critical (Tornado) with alert sound, High priority (Severe Thunderstorm, Flash Flood), Default (Winter Storm, Heat Advisory), Low (Daily Forecast). Handle notification payload with alertId, locationId, and deep link actions.

title: Implement OAuth2 authentication (Google, Apple)
description: Add OAuth2 support for Google and Apple sign-in as alternative authentication methods

title: Connect CurrentConditionsCard to weather API data service
description: Implement data binding between CurrentConditionsCard component and weather API. Transform API response to component props, handle loading/error states, implement data refresh on location change.

title: Implement tropical storm details data integration
description: Build data service for active tropical systems. Fetch storm position, category, wind speed, pressure, movement direction/speed. Transform NHC data to display format.

title: Build NEXRAD radar data adapter
description: Implement adapter for NEXRAD AWS radar tile data with 5-10 minute update frequency, including MRMS multi-radar mosaic support

title: Implement day/night forecast split logic
description: Create logic to split daily forecasts into separate day and night periods. Calculate appropriate time boundaries based on sunrise/sunset, aggregate data for each period.

title: Implement AlertBanner component with severity color coding
description: Build AlertBanner component that displays active weather alerts. Implement color mapping: Warning (Red #DC2626), Watch (Orange #F97316), Advisory (Yellow #EAB308). Include onPress handler for navigation to alert details. Support multiple alerts with horizontal scroll or stacked display.

title: Implement Radar/Maps screen with animated radar overlay
description: Build the maps screen (/(tabs)/maps) with full-screen MapView using react-native-maps, RadarOverlay with animated radar tiles, LayerSelector bottom sheet for layer controls (Radar, Satellite, Temperature, Alerts, Wind), AnimationControls with play/pause and timeline scrubber, and LocationButton to center on user location. Support 2-hour radar animation loop with speed controls (0.5x, 1x, 2x).

title: Build future radar prediction overlay
description: Implement 1-2 hour predictive radar display. Integrate forecast radar data, distinguish predicted vs observed radar visually, handle prediction confidence display.

title: Build data source toggle between official and PWS
description: Implement user preference for official vs PWS data source. Handle data source switching, blend PWS data into forecasts where applicable, show data source attribution.

title: Implement Geocoding endpoint
description: Build GET /locations/geocode endpoint for reverse geocoding lat/lon coordinates to location names and metadata

title: Build hurricane track cone of uncertainty visualization
description: Implement NHC cone of uncertainty rendering on map. Parse forecast track data, render uncertainty cone polygon, display 5-day forecast positions with timestamps and storm details.

title: Set up design system with color palette and typography
description: Implement design system constants including full color palette (primary, temperature gradient, alerts, AQI, neutrals), typography scale (h1-h3, body sizes, temperature displays), spacing system (xs:4 to 4xl:40), and border radius values. Configure NativeWind for Tailwind-style styling.

title: Set up Bull job queue for background tasks

title: Implement weather data state machine

title: Build location search with autocomplete
description: Implement location search flow: debounced input (300ms), API call to /search endpoint, dropdown with recent locations, current location option, and search results. Handle result selection and navigation to weather page.

title: Implement daily forecast interaction
description: Build 10-day forecast list with condensed cards, expand card on tap to show details, navigate to day detail page on second tap. Implement swipe quick actions on mobile for adding reminders.

title: Implement Location Search endpoint
description: Build GET /locations/search endpoint with query parameter, result limit, and response including city/state/country/coordinates with location type

title: Configure TimescaleDB for PWS time-series data
description: Set up TimescaleDB extension with pws_observations hypertable and pws_stations table. Configure compression policy (7 days) and retention policy (2 years)

title: Implement weather data initial load sequence
description: Implement the initial load sequence for weather data: parse location from URL params, check cache, then parallel fetch current conditions, hourly forecast, and active alerts. Render skeleton UI while loading, then full content on completion.

title: Build AirQualityCard and SunMoonCard components
description: Implement AirQualityCard with AQI display using color coding (Good #22C55E, Moderate #EAB308, Sensitive #F97316, Unhealthy #EF4444, VeryUnhealthy #8B5CF6, Hazardous #7F1D1D). Build SunMoonCard showing sunrise/sunset times and moon phase with appropriate icons.

title: Build guest data migration on registration
description: Implement migration of guest data when user registers: transfer saved locations, preferences, and recent searches from localStorage to user account. Handle conflict resolution for duplicate data.

title: Implement weather data caching and refresh strategy
description: Build smart caching layer for weather data. Implement TTL-based cache invalidation, background refresh, stale-while-revalidate pattern. Handle offline scenarios with cached data.

title: Implement WebSocket real-time events
description: Build Socket.IO server for real-time events: alert:new, alert:update, alert:expire, weather:update, radar:frame. Implement room-based location subscriptions

title: Implement login and session management
description: Build login flow: credential submission, JWT + refresh token handling, store JWT in memory and refresh token in httpOnly cookie. Fetch user preferences on login, handle session refresh and expiration.

title: Build barometric pressure trend indicator
description: Implement rising/falling/steady pressure trend calculation by comparing current pressure to historical readings. Include visual indicator (arrows) and trend text. Store pressure history for trend analysis.

title: Build radar animation playback controller
description: Implement radar loop animation with play/pause/step controls. Support configurable speed (1x/2x/4x), loop length (1-6 hours), frame preloading, and smooth transitions between frames.

title: Configure React Query for weather data fetching
description: Set up React Query with appropriate stale times, cache times, and retry logic for weather data. Configure query keys for current, hourly, daily forecasts and alerts. Implement query invalidation on location change.

title: Implement cache invalidation system
description: Build event-driven cache invalidation for weather_update, alert_update, and radar_update events with region-based selective invalidation

title: Implement alert history tracking and storage
description: Build system to track recently expired alerts. Store alert history with expiration timestamps, implement cleanup of old alerts, provide historical alert lookup for location.

title: Implement UV index risk level mapping and display
description: Create UV index to risk descriptor mapping (Low/Moderate/High/Very High/Extreme). Include color coding per EPA standards and exposure time recommendations based on UV level.

title: Implement hourly forecast interaction
description: Build hourly forecast carousel showing 6-8 hours, swipe to reveal more. Implement hour detail modal on tap, toggle between carousel and chart view with animated transition, chart hover/tap tooltips.

title: Build PWS owner dashboard
description: Implement PWS dashboard: show station status, current readings (temp, humidity, wind, pressure, rain), historical charts with time range selectors, station health indicators, quick action buttons (edit, download, share).

title: Implement Weather Dashboard screen with LocationHeader and pull-to-refresh

Implement pull-to-refresh functionality.

title: Implement auto-refresh flow for weather data
description: Implement auto-refresh logic: 5-minute timer for current conditions, visibility change listener to refresh stale data when page becomes visible, WebSocket alert handler to invalidate cache and fetch fresh data.

title: Implement Hourly Forecast endpoint
description: Build GET /weather/hourly endpoint supporting 48-168 hours forecast, lat/lon and location query, units conversion, and proper response structure

title: Build bottom tab navigator with all main screens

Configure proper icons and active/inactive states. Set up WeatherStack, MapsStack, AlertsStack, and SettingsStack nested navigators.

title: Implement sign up flow with OAuth

title: Implement alert severity color coding system
description: Create alert severity mapping with EPA/NWS standard color hierarchy (red/orange/yellow). Include accessibility-compliant color palette and severity ranking logic for alert prioritization.

title: Implement network error handling
description: Build comprehensive error handling: detect network vs server vs client errors, show offline banner with cached data, implement exponential backoff retry (1s-2s-4s-8s), display appropriate error messages and retry buttons.

title: Implement Radar Tiles endpoint

title: Implement Astronomy endpoint

title: Set up PostgreSQL database with migrations
description: Database setup, initial schema, migration tooling

title: Implement map layer toggle state management
description: Build state management for map layer visibility. Track active layers, handle layer dependencies, persist user layer preferences. Support base map, radar, alerts, temperature, satellite layers.

title: Implement Active Alerts endpoint
description: Build GET /alerts/active endpoint with lat/lon query, radius search (default 25 miles), severity filtering (warning/watch/advisory), and NWS alert structure support

title: Implement location search state machine
description: Build state machine for search: idle, typing, debouncing, searching, results, error, selected states. Handle transitions for keypress, debounce timer, API response, result selection, and escape/clear actions.

title: Build winter weather accumulation forecast display
description: Implement snowfall and ice accumulation forecast visualization. Display expected totals, timing bands, snow depth maps. Include wind chill calculation and display.

title: Build location disambiguation UI flow
description: Implement selection interface when search returns multiple location matches. Display city, state, country context. Handle user selection and redirect to chosen location weather page.

title: Build WeatherDetailsGrid component for UV, humidity, wind, pressure
description: Implement WeatherDetailsGrid with individual cards for UV index, humidity percentage, wind speed/direction, and barometric pressure. Use appropriate icons and color coding (e.g., UV moderate/high indicators). Support dynamic unit display based on user preferences.

title: Implement unit conversion service for all weather data
description: Build centralized unit conversion utility supporting F/C temperature, mph/km/h wind, in/mm precipitation, mb/inHg pressure. Handle user preference storage and real-time conversion.

title: Build astronomy sunrise/sunset and moon phase display

title: Build push notification handling

title: Build alert polygon to map integration

title: Set up Zustand store for weather page state

title: Build modal screens for LocationSearch and LocationPicker

title: Implement dark mode theme support with system preference detection

title: Build PWS station registration flow

title: Implement Radar Timestamps endpoint

title: Implement feels-like temperature calculation logic

title: Build radar map with animation controls
